comments.author: angela
comments.body:
while adding the missing mimetypes would be a quick short-term solution (and no problem), i was rather thinking about a mechanism, that allows to extend (or modify) the mimetype-lookup using the configuration.

-> adjusting summary

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Adjusting priority, this is not a critical issue.

description: The mime-types from Oasis OpenDocument are missing from mimetypes.properties file.
